item.title: How to Build Confidence
item.description: I recently had a conversation with my Uncle regarding confidence in life. Since I’m from an Indian heritage and background, my parents and my uncles weren’t well off when they were growing up. They didn’t have the fallback / cushion of a well-off family to support them in their endeavors. They had to work hard, and they had to work smart. Recently I’ve been trying to imbibe and incorporate Atomic Habits into my routine.
